mc.name: Arcane Denial
mc.oracleText:
Counter target spell. Its controller may draw up to two cards at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.
You draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.
mc.printedText:
Counter target spell. Its controller may draw up to two cards at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.
You draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

mc.name: Balduvian Horde
mc.oracleText: When Balduvian Horde comes into play, sacrifice it unless you discard a card at random.
mc.printedText: When Balduvian Horde comes into play, sacrifice it unless you discard a card at random.
mc.flavorText:
"Peace will come only when we have taken Varchild's head."
--Lovisa Coldeyes, Balduvian chieftain

mc.name: Apprentice Wizard
mc.oracleText: {U}, {T}: Add {3} to your mana pool.
mc.printedText: {U}, {T}: Add {3} to your mana pool.

mc.name: Contagion
mc.oracleText:
You may pay 1 life and remove a black card in your hand from the game rather than pay Contagion's mana cost.
Distribute two -2/-1 counters among one or two target creatures.
mc.printedText:
You may pay 1 life and remove a black card in your hand from the game rather than pay Contagion's mana cost.
Distribute two -2/-1 counters among one or two target creatures.

mc.name: Diminishing Returns
mc.oracleText: Each player shuffles his or her hand and graveyard into his or her library. You remove the top ten cards of your library from the game. Then each player draws up to seven cards.
mc.printedText: Each player shuffles his or her hand and graveyard into his or her library. You remove the top ten cards of your library from the game. Then each player draws up to seven cards.

mc.name: Exile
mc.oracleText: Remove target nonwhite attacking creature from the game. You gain life equal to its toughness.
mc.printedText: Remove target nonwhite attacking creature from the game. You gain life equal to its toughness.

mc.name: Force of Will
mc.oracleText:
You may pay 1 life and remove a blue card in your hand from the game rather than pay Force of Will's mana cost.
Counter target spell.
mc.printedText:
You may pay 1 life and remove a blue card in your hand from the game rather than pay Force of Will's mana cost.
Counter target spell.

mc.name: Gargantuan Gorilla
mc.oracleText:
At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Gargantuan Gorilla unless you sacrifice a Forest. If you sacrifice Gargantuan Gorilla this way, it deals 7 damage to you. If you sacrifice a snow Forest this way, Gargantuan Gorilla gains trample until end of turn.
{T}: Gargantuan Gorilla deals damage equal to its power to target creature. That creature deals damage equal to its power to Gargantuan Gorilla.
mc.printedText:
At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Gargantuan Gorilla unless you sacrifice a Forest. If you sacrifice Gargantuan Gorilla this way, it deals 7 damage to you. If you sacrifice a snow Forest this way, Gargantuan Gorilla gains trample until end of turn.
{T}: Gargantuan Gorilla deals damage equal to its power to target creature. That creature deals damage equal to its power to Gargantuan Gorilla.

mc.name: Lake of the Dead
mc.oracleText:
If Lake of the Dead would come into play, sacrifice a Swamp instead. If you do, put Lake of the Dead into play. If you don't, put it into its owner's graveyard.
{T}: Add {B} to your mana pool.
{T}, Sacrifice a Swamp: Add {B}{B}{B}{B} to your mana pool.
mc.printedText:
If Lake of the Dead would come into play, sacrifice a Swamp instead. If you do, put Lake of the Dead into play. If you don't, put it into its owner's graveyard.
{T}: Add {B} to your mana pool.
{T}, Sacrifice a Swamp: Add {B}{B}{B}{B} to your mana pool.

mc.name: Lord of Tresserhorn
mc.oracleText:
When Lord of Tresserhorn comes into play, you lose 2 life and sacrifice two creatures, and an opponent draws two cards.
{B}: Regenerate Lord of Tresserhorn.
mc.printedText:
When Lord of Tresserhorn comes into play, you lose 2 life and sacrifice two creatures, and an opponent draws two cards.
{B}: Regenerate Lord of Tresserhorn.

mc.name: Phelddagrif
mc.oracleText:
{G}: Phelddagrif gains trample until end of turn. Target opponent puts a 1/1 green Hippo creature token into play.
{W}: Phelddagrif gains flying until end of turn. Target opponent gains 2 life.
{U}: Return Phelddagrif to its owner's hand. Target opponent may draw a card.
mc.printedText:
{G}: Phelddagrif gains trample until end of turn. Target opponent puts a 1/1 green Hippo creature token into play.
{W}: Phelddagrif gains flying until end of turn. Target opponent gains 2 life.
{U}: Return Phelddagrif to its owner's hand. Target opponent may draw a card.

mc.name: Phyrexian War Beast
mc.oracleText: When Phyrexian War Beast leaves play, sacrifice a land and Phyrexian War Beast deals 1 damage to you.
mc.printedText: When Phyrexian War Beast leaves play, sacrifice a land and Phyrexian War Beast deals 1 damage to you.
mc.flavorText:
"Knowing its origins, how could they have thought they could control it?"
--Sorine Relicbane, Soldevi heretic

mc.name: Shield Sphere
mc.oracleText:
Defender
Whenever Shield Sphere blocks, put a -0/-1 counter on it.
mc.printedText:
Defender
Whenever Shield Sphere blocks, put a -0/-1 counter on it.
mc.flavorText:
"My soldiers know that they need never fear for their protection."
--King Darien of Kjeldor

mc.name: Thawing Glaciers
mc.oracleText:
Thawing Glaciers comes into play tapped.
{1}, {T}: Search your library for a basic land card, put that card into play tapped, then shuffle your library. Thawing Glaciers gains substance until end of turn. Return Thawing Glaciers to its owner's hand when it loses substance.
mc.printedText:
Thawing Glaciers comes into play tapped.
{1}, {T}: Search your library for a basic land card, put that card into play tapped, then shuffle your library. Thawing Glaciers gains substance until end of turn. Return Thawing Glaciers to its owner's hand when it loses substance.

mc.name: Yavimaya Ants
mc.oracleText:
Trample, haste
Cumulative upkeep {G}{G}
mc.printedText:
Trample, haste
Cumulative upkeep {G}{G}
mc.flavorText:
"Few natural forces are as devastating as hunger."
--Kaysa, elder druid of the Juniper Order

mc.name: Ashnod's Transmogrant
mc.oracleText: {T}, Sacrifice Ashnod's Transmogrant: Put a +1/+1 counter on target nonartifact creature. That creature becomes an artifact in addition to its other types.
mc.printedText: {T}, Sacrifice Ashnod's Transmogrant: Put a +1/+1 counter on target nonartifact creature. That creature becomes an artifact in addition to its other types.
mc.flavorText: Ashnod found few willing to trade their humanity for the power she offered them.

mc.name: Ivory Tower
mc.oracleText: At the beginning of your upkeep, you gain X life, where X is the number of cards in your hand minus four.
mc.printedText: At the beginning of your upkeep, you gain X life, where X is the number of cards in your hand minus four.
mc.flavorText: Valuing scholarship above all else, the inhabitants of the Ivory Tower reward those who sacrifice power for knowledge.

mc.name: Mishra's Factory
mc.oracleText:
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.
{1}: Mishra's Factory becomes a 2/2 Assembly-Worker artifact creature until end of turn. It's still a land.
{T}: Target Assembly-Worker creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
mc.printedText:
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.
{1}: Mishra's Factory becomes a 2/2 Assembly-Worker artifact creature until end of turn. It's still a land.
{T}: Target Assembly-Worker creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

mc.name: Onulet
mc.oracleText: When Onulet is put into a graveyard from play, you gain 2 life.
mc.printedText: When Onulet is put into a graveyard from play, you gain 2 life.
mc.flavorText: An early inspiration for Urza, Tocasia's onulets contained magical essences that could be cannibalized after they stopped functioning.

mc.name: Orcish Mechanics
mc.oracleText: {T}, Sacrifice an artifact: Orcish Mechanics deals 2 damage to target creature or player.
mc.printedText: {T}, Sacrifice an artifact: Orcish Mechanics deals 2 damage to target creature or player.

mc.name: Su-Chi
mc.oracleText: When Su-Chi is put into a graveyard from play, add {4} to your mana pool.
mc.printedText: When Su-Chi is put into a graveyard from play, add {4} to your mana pool.
mc.flavorText: Flawed copies of relics from the Thran Empire, the su-chi were inherently unstable but provided useful knowledge for Tocasia's students.

mc.name: Tawnos's Coffin
mc.oracleText:
You may choose not to untap Tawnos's Coffin during your untap step.
{3}, {T}: Remove target creature and all Auras attached to it from the game. Note the number and kind of counters that were on that creature. When Tawnos's Coffin leaves play or becomes untapped, return the removed card to play under its owner's control tapped with the noted number and kind of counters on it, and if you do, return the removed Aura cards to play under their owner's control attached to that permanent.
mc.printedText:
You may choose not to untap Tawnos's Coffin during your untap step.
{3}, {T}: Remove target creature and all Auras attached to it from the game. Note the number and kind of counters that were on that creature. When Tawnos's Coffin leaves play or becomes untapped, return the removed card to play under its owner's control tapped with the noted number and kind of counters on it, and if you do, return the removed Aura cards to play under their owner's control attached to that permanent.

mc.name: Cuombajj Witches
mc.oracleText: {T}: Cuombajj Witches deals 1 damage to target creature or player and 1 damage to target creature or player of an opponent's choice.
mc.printedText: {T}: Cuombajj Witches deals 1 damage to target creature or player and 1 damage to target creature or player of an opponent's choice.

mc.name: Diamond Valley
mc.oracleText: {T}, Sacrifice a creature: You gain life equal to the sacrificed creature's toughness.
mc.printedText: {T}, Sacrifice a creature: You gain life equal to the sacrificed creature's toughness.

mc.name: Erg Raiders
mc.oracleText: At the end of your turn, if Erg Raiders didn't attack this turn, Erg Raiders deals 2 damage to you unless it came under your control this turn.
mc.printedText: At the end of your turn, if Erg Raiders didn't attack this turn, Erg Raiders deals 2 damage to you unless it came under your control this turn.

mc.name: Ghazbán Ogre
mc.oracleText: At the beginning of your upkeep, if a player has more life than any other, that player gains control of Ghazbán Ogre.
mc.printedText: At the beginning of your upkeep, if a player has more life than any other, that player gains control of Ghazban Ogre.

mc.name: Giant Tortoise
mc.oracleText: Giant Tortoise gets +0/+3 as long as it's untapped.
mc.printedText: Giant Tortoise gets +0/+3 as long as it's untapped.

mc.name: Ifh-Biff Efreet
mc.oracleText:
Flying
{G}: Ifh-Biff Efreet deals 1 damage to each creature with flying and each player. Any player may play this ability.
mc.printedText:
Flying
{G}: Ifh-Biff Efreet deals 1 damage to each creature with flying and each player. Any player may play this ability.

mc.name: Juzám Djinn
mc.oracleText: At the beginning of your upkeep, Juzám Djinn deals 1 damage to you.
mc.printedText: At the beginning of your upkeep, Juzam Djinn deals 1 damage to you.
mc.flavorText:
"Expect my visit when the darkness comes. The night I think is best for hiding all."
--Ouallada

mc.name: Oubliette
mc.oracleText:
When Oubliette comes into play, remove target creature and all Auras attached to it from the game. Note the number and kind of counters that were on that creature.
When Oubliette leaves play, return the removed card to play under its owner's control tapped with the noted number and kind of counters on it. If you do, return the removed Aura cards to play under their owner's control attached to that permanent.
mc.printedText:
When Oubliette comes into play, remove target creature and all Auras attached to it from the game. Note the number and kind of counters that were on that creature.
When Oubliette leaves play, return the removed card to play under its owner's control tapped with the noted number and kind of counters on it. If you do, return the removed Aura cards to play under their owner's control attached to that permanent.

mc.name: Ring of Ma'rûf
mc.oracleText: {5}, {T}, Remove Ring of Ma'ruf from the game: The next time you would draw a card this turn, instead choose a card you own from outside the game and put it into your hand.
mc.printedText: {5}, {T}, Remove Ring of Ma'ruf from the game: The next time you would draw a card this turn, instead choose a card you own from outside the game and put it into your hand.

mc.name: Serendib Efreet
mc.oracleText:
Flying
At the beginning of your upkeep, Serendib Efreet deals 1 damage to you.
mc.printedText:
Flying
At the beginning of your upkeep, Serendib Efreet deals 1 damage to you.

mc.name: Ball Lightning
mc.oracleText:
Trample (If this creature would deal enough damage to its blockers to destroy them, you may have it deal the rest of its damage to defending player or planeswalker.)
Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)
At the beginning of the end step, sacrifice Ball Lightning.
mc.printedText:
Trample, haste
At end of turn, sacrifice Ball Lightning.

mc.name: Brothers of Fire
mc.oracleText: {1}{R}{R}: Brothers of Fire deals 1 damage to target creature or player and 1 damage to you.
mc.printedText: {1}{R}{R}: Brothers of Fire deals 1 damage to target creature or player and 1 damage to you.
mc.flavorText: Fire is never a gentle master.

mc.name: Carnivorous Plant
mc.oracleText: Defender
mc.printedText: Defender
mc.flavorText:
"It had a mouth like that of a great beast, and gnashed its teeth as it strained to reach us. I am thankful it possessed no means of locomotion."
--Vervamon the Elder

mc.name: Dust to Dust
mc.oracleText: Remove two target artifacts from the game.
mc.printedText: Remove two target artifacts from the game.
mc.flavorText: Tervish never noticed that the amulet had vanished. It had disappeared not only from his possession, but from his memory as well.

mc.name: Eater of the Dead
mc.oracleText: {0}: If Eater of the Dead is tapped, untap it and remove target creature card in a graveyard from the game.
mc.printedText: Untap Eater of the Dead: Remove target creature card in a graveyard from the game.
mc.flavorText: Even the putrid muscles of the dead can provide strength to those loathsome enough to consume them.

mc.name: Fissure
mc.oracleText: Destroy target creature or land. It can't be regenerated.
mc.printedText: Destroy target creature or land. It can't be regenerated.
mc.flavorText:
"Must not all things at the last be swallowed up in death?"
--Plato, Phaedo, trans. Jowett

mc.name: Holy Light
mc.oracleText: Nonwhite creatures get -1/-1 until end of turn.
mc.printedText: Nonwhite creatures get -1/-1 until end of turn.
mc.flavorText:
"Bathed in hallowed light, the infidels looked upon the impurities of their souls and despaired."
--The Book of Tal

mc.name: Knights of Thorn
mc.oracleText: Banding, protection from red
mc.printedText: Banding, protection from red
mc.flavorText:
"With a great cry, the goblin host broke and ran as the first wave of knights penetrated its ranks."
--Tivadar of Thorn,
History of the Goblin Wars

mc.name: Preacher
mc.oracleText:
You may choose not to untap Preacher during your untap step.
{T}: Gain control of target creature of an opponent's choice that he or she controls as long as Preacher remains tapped.
mc.printedText:
You may choose not to untap Preacher during your untap step.
{T}: Gain control of target creature of an opponent's choice that he or she controls as long as Preacher remains tapped.

mc.name: Stone Calendar
mc.oracleText: Spells you play cost up to {1} less to play.
mc.printedText: Spells you play cost up to {1} less to play.
mc.flavorText: The Pretender Mairsil ordered a great calendar drawn up to show when the paths to the Dark Lands were strongest.

mc.name: Sunken City
mc.oracleText:
At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Sunken City unless you pay {U}{U}.
Blue creatures get +1/+1.
mc.printedText:
At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Sunken City unless you pay {U}{U}.
Blue creatures get +1/+1.

mc.name: The Fallen
mc.oracleText: At the beginning of your upkeep, The Fallen deals 1 damage to each opponent it has dealt damage to this game.
mc.printedText: At the beginning of your upkeep, The Fallen deals 1 damage to each opponent it has dealt damage to this game.
mc.flavorText: Magic often masters those who cannot master it.

mc.name: Breeding Pit
mc.oracleText:
At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Breeding Pit unless you pay {B}{B}.
At the end of your turn, put a 0/1 black Thrull creature token into play.
mc.printedText:
At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Breeding Pit unless you pay {B}{B}.
At the end of your turn, put a 0/1 black Thrull creature token into play.
mc.flavorText: The thrulls bred at a terrifying pace. In the end, they overwhelmed the Order of the Ebon Hand.

mc.name: Derelor
mc.oracleText: Black spells you play cost {B} more to play.
mc.printedText: Black spells you play cost {B} more to play.
mc.flavorText:
"Strength it has, but at the cost of a continuous supply of energy. Such failure can bear only one result."
--Execution order of Endrek Sahr,
master breeder

mc.name: Dwarven Soldier
mc.oracleText: Whenever Dwarven Soldier blocks or becomes blocked by one or more Orcs, Dwarven Soldier gets +0/+2 until end of turn.
mc.printedText: Whenever Dwarven Soldier blocks or becomes blocked by one or more Orcs, Dwarven Soldier gets +0/+2 until end of turn.
mc.flavorText:
"Let no one say we did not fight until the last . . . ."
--Headstone fragment from a mass grave found in the Crimson Peaks

mc.name: Hand of Justice
mc.oracleText: {T}, Tap three untapped white creatures you control: Destroy target creature.
mc.printedText: {T}, Tap three untapped white creatures you control: Destroy target creature.
mc.flavorText:
"The Hand of Justice will come to cleanse the world if we are true."
--Oliver Farrel

mc.name: High Tide
mc.oracleText: Until end of turn, whenever a player taps an Island for mana, that player adds {U} to his or her mana pool.
mc.printedText: Until end of turn, whenever a player taps an Island for mana, that player adds {U} to his or her mana pool.
mc.flavorText:
"May Svyelun and her tides favor you."
--Traditional merfolk blessing

mc.name: Homarid Spawning Bed
mc.oracleText: {1}{U}{U}, Sacrifice a blue creature: Put X 1/1 blue Camarid creature tokens into play, where X is the sacrificed creature's converted mana cost.
mc.printedText: {1}{U}{U}, Sacrifice a blue creature: Put X 1/1 blue Camarid creature tokens into play, where X is the sacrificed creature's converted mana cost.

mc.name: Hymn to Tourach
mc.oracleText: Target player discards two cards at random.
mc.printedText: Target player discards two cards at random.
mc.flavorText: Knowing the hymn's power, the followers of Leitbur carefully guarded their pillaged transciptions.

mc.name: Order of Leitbur
mc.oracleText:
Protection from black
{W}: Order of Leitbur gains first strike until end of turn.
{W}{W}: Order of Leitbur gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
mc.printedText:
Protection from black
{W}{W}: Order of Leitbur gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
{W}: Order of Leitbur gains first strike until end of turn.
mc.flavorText:
"Trained to battle the followers of Tourach, the Order of Leitbur was not as successful in later conflicts with orcish and goblin raiders."
--Sarpadian Empires, vol. I

mc.name: Order of the Ebon Hand
mc.oracleText:
Protection from white
{B}: Order of the Ebon Hand gains first strike until end of turn.
{B}{B}: Order of the Ebon Hand gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
mc.printedText:
Protection from white
{B}{B}: Order of the Ebon Hand gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
{B}: Order of the Ebon Hand gains first strike until end of turn.

mc.name: Thorn Thallid
mc.oracleText:
At the beginning of your upkeep, put a spore counter on Thorn Thallid.
Remove three spore counters from Thorn Thallid: Thorn Thallid deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
mc.printedText:
At the beginning of your upkeep, put a spore counter on Thorn Thallid.
Remove three spore counters from Thorn Thallid: Thorn Thallid deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
mc.flavorText:
"The danger in cultivating massive plants caught the elves by surprise."
--Sarpadian Empires, vol. III

mc.name: Thrull Champion
mc.oracleText:
Thrull creatures get +1/+1.
{T}: Gain control of target Thrull as long as you control Thrull Champion.
mc.printedText:
Thrull creatures get +1/+1.
{T}: Gain control of target Thrull as long as you control Thrull Champion.
mc.flavorText:
"Those idiots should never have bred thrulls for combat!"
--Jherana Rure

mc.name: Thrull Retainer
mc.oracleText:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1.
Sacrifice Thrull Retainer: Regenerate enchanted creature.
mc.printedText:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1.
Sacrifice Thrull Retainer: Regenerate enchanted creature.
mc.flavorText:
"Until the Rebellion, thrulls served their masters faithfully--even at the cost of their own lives."
--Sarpadian Empires, vol. II

mc.name: Vodalian Knights
mc.oracleText:
First strike
Vodalian Knights can't attack unless defending player controls an Island.
When you control no Islands, sacrifice Vodalian Knights.
{U}: Vodalian Knights gains flying until end of turn.
mc.printedText:
First strike
Vodalian Knights can't attack unless defending player controls an Island.
When you control no Islands, sacrifice Vodalian Knights.
{U}: Vodalian Knights gains flying until end of turn.
mc.flavorText: Fear the knight leaping from the water into the air, weapon ready.

mc.name: Autumn Willow
mc.oracleText:
Shroud
{G}: Until end of turn, Autumn Willow can be the target of spells and abilities controlled by target player as though it didn't have shroud.
mc.printedText:
Shroud
{G}: Until end of turn, Autumn Willow can be the target of spells and abilities controlled by target player as though it didn't have shroud.
mc.flavorText:
"We must shake her limbs and rattle her brains."
--Grandmother Sengir

mc.name: Baron Sengir
mc.oracleText:
Flying
Whenever a creature dealt damage by Baron Sengir this turn is put into a graveyard, put a +2/+2 counter on Baron Sengir.
{T}: Regenerate another target Vampire.
mc.printedText:
Flying
Whenever a creature dealt damage by Baron Sengir this turn is put into a graveyard, put a +2/+2 counter on Baron Sengir.
{T}: Regenerate another target Vampire.
mc.flavorText:
"Beast. Defiler. The source of all my pain."
--Ihsan's Shade

mc.name: Hungry Mist
mc.oracleText: At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Hungry Mist unless you pay {G}{G}.
mc.printedText: At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Hungry Mist unless you pay {G}{G}.
mc.flavorText:
"If the air must feed, let it take the self-righteous."
--Murat, death speaker

mc.name: Primal Order
mc.oracleText: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, Primal Order deals damage to that player equal to the number of nonbasic lands he or she controls.
mc.printedText: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, Primal Order deals damage to that player equal to the number of nonbasic lands he or she controls.
mc.flavorText:
"It's strange, but I can feel it when the land is corrupted. I understand why the Autumn Willow is so protective."
--Daria

mc.name: Roots
mc.oracleText:
Enchant creature without flying
When Roots comes into play, tap enchanted creature.
Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.
mc.printedText:
Enchant creature without flying
When Roots comes into play, tap enchanted creature.
Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.
mc.flavorText:
"That which nourishes can also bind."
--Gemma, Willow Priestess

mc.name: Sea Sprite
mc.oracleText: Flying, protection from red
mc.printedText: Flying, protection from red
mc.flavorText:
"No one can catch what won't be caught."
--Kakra, sea troll

mc.name: Spectral Bears
mc.oracleText: Whenever Spectral Bears attacks, if defending player controls no black nontoken permanents, it doesn't untap during your next untap step.
mc.printedText: Whenever Spectral Bears attacks, if defending player controls no black nontoken permanents, it doesn't untap during your next untap step.
mc.flavorText:
"I hear there are bears--or spirits--that guard caravans passing through the forest."
--Gulsen, abbey matron

mc.name: Chub Toad
mc.oracleText: Whenever Chub Toad blocks or becomes blocked, it gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
mc.printedText: Whenever Chub Toad blocks or becomes blocked, it gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
mc.flavorText:
"Chub toad, chub toad
At the door.
Run away quick
Or you'll run no more."
--Traditional children's rhyme

mc.name: Fyndhorn Elves
mc.oracleText: {T}: Add {G} to your mana pool.
mc.printedText: {T}: Add {G} to your mana pool.
mc.flavorText:
"Living side by side with the elves for so long leaves me with no doubt that we serve the same goddess."
--Kolbjorn, elder druid of the Juniper Order

mc.name: Goblin Mutant
mc.oracleText:
Trample
Goblin Mutant can't attack if defending player controls an untapped creature with power 3 or greater.
Goblin Mutant can't block creatures with power 3 or greater.
mc.printedText:
Trample
Goblin Mutant can't attack if defending player controls an untapped creature with power 3 or greater.
Goblin Mutant can't block creatures with power 3 or greater.
mc.flavorText: If only it had three brains, too.

mc.name: Hallowed Ground
mc.oracleText: {W}{W}: Return target nonsnow land you control to its owner's hand.
mc.printedText: {W}{W}: Return target nonsnow land you control to its owner's hand.
mc.flavorText:
"On this site where Kjeld's blood was spilled, let none raise a fist or deny a beggar."
--Halvor Arenson, Kjeldoran priest

mc.name: Hydroblast
mc.oracleText: Choose one - Counter target spell if it's red; or destroy target permanent if it's red.
mc.printedText: Choose one Counter target spell if it's red; or destroy target permanent if it's red.
mc.flavorText:
"Heed the lessons of our time: the forms of water may move the land itself and hold captive the fires within."
--Gustha Ebbasdotter,
Kjeldoran royal mage

mc.name: Illusionary Forces
mc.oracleText:
Flying
Cumulative upkeep {U}
mc.printedText:
Flying
Cumulative upkeep {U}
mc.flavorText:
"This school was founded in secret, operates in secret, and exists for the teaching of secrets. Those who would alter reality must first escape it."
--Gerda Aagesdotter,
Archmage of the Unseen

mc.name: Illusionary Wall
mc.oracleText:
Defender, flying, first strike
Cumulative upkeep {U}
mc.printedText:
Defender, flying, first strike
Cumulative upkeep {U}
mc.flavorText:
"Let them see what is not there and feel what does not touch them. When they no longer trust their senses, that is the time to strike."
--Gerda Aagesdotter,
Archmage of the Unseen

mc.name: Jokulhaups
mc.oracleText: Destroy all artifacts, creatures, and lands. They can't be regenerated.
mc.printedText: Destroy all artifacts, creatures, and lands. They can't be regenerated.
mc.flavorText:
"I was shocked when I first saw the aftermath of the Yavimaya Valley disaster. The raging waters had swept away trees, bridges, and even houses. My healers had much work to do."
--Halvor Arenson, Kjeldoran priest

mc.name: Márton Stromgald
mc.oracleText:
Whenever Márton Stromgald attacks, other attacking creatures get +1/+1 until end of turn for each attacking creature other than Márton Stromgald.
Whenever Márton Stromgald blocks, other blocking creatures get +1/+1 until end of turn for each blocking creature other than Márton Stromgald.
mc.printedText:
Whenever Marton Stromgald attacks, other attacking creatures get +1/+1 until end of turn for each attacking creature other than Marton Stromgald.
Whenever Marton Stromgald blocks, other blocking creatures get +1/+1 until end of turn for each blocking creature other than Marton Stromgald.

mc.name: Nature's Lore
mc.oracleText: Search your library for a Forest card and put that card into play. Then shuffle your library.
mc.printedText: Search your library for a Forest card and put that card into play. Then shuffle your library.
mc.flavorText:
"Fyndhorn is our home."
--Kolbjorn, elder druid of the Juniper Order

mc.name: Polar Kraken
mc.oracleText:
Trample
Polar Kraken comes into play tapped.
Cumulative upkeep-Sacrifice a land.
mc.printedText:
Trample
Polar Kraken comes into play tapped.
Cumulative upkeep--Sacrifice a land.
mc.flavorText:
"It was big. Really, really, big. No, bigger than that. It was big!"
--Arna Kennerud, skyknight

mc.name: Pox
mc.oracleText: Each player loses a third of his or her life, then discards a third of the cards in his or her hand, then sacrifices a third of the creatures he or she controls, then sacrifices a third of the lands he or she controls. Round up each time.
mc.printedText: Each player loses a third of his or her life, then discards a third of the cards in his or her hand, then sacrifices a third of the creatures he or she controls, then sacrifices a third of the lands he or she controls. Round up each time.

mc.name: Pyroblast
mc.oracleText: Choose one - Counter target spell if it's blue; or destroy target permanent if it's blue.
mc.printedText: Choose one Counter target spell if it's blue; or destroy target permanent if it's blue.
mc.flavorText:
"Just the thing for those pesky water mages."
--Jaya Ballard, task mage

mc.name: Seraph
mc.oracleText:
Flying
Whenever a creature dealt damage by Seraph this turn is put into a graveyard, put that card into play under your control at end of turn. Sacrifice the creature when you lose control of Seraph.
mc.printedText:
Flying
Whenever a creature dealt damage by Seraph this turn is put into a graveyard, put that card into play under your control at end of turn. Sacrifice the creature when you lose control of Seraph.

mc.name: Shambling Strider
mc.oracleText: {R}{G}: Shambling Strider gets +1/-1 until end of turn.
mc.printedText: {R}{G}: Shambling Strider gets +1/-1 until end of turn.
mc.flavorText: Freyalise forbid that any stranger should wander into the striders' territory.

mc.name: Urza's Bauble
mc.oracleText: {T}, Sacrifice Urza's Bauble: Look at a card at random in target player's hand. You draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.
mc.printedText: {T}, Sacrifice Urza's Bauble: Look at a card at random in target player's hand. You draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

mc.name: Walking Wall
mc.oracleText:
Defender
{3}: Walking Wall gets +3/-1 until end of turn and can attack this turn as though it didn't have defender. Play this ability only once each turn.
mc.printedText:
Defender
{3}: Walking Wall gets +3/-1 until end of turn and can attack this turn as though it didn't have defender. Play this ability only once each turn.
mc.flavorText:
"The fortress is not what it seems."
--Arcum Dagsson, Soldevi machinist

mc.name: Animate Dead
mc.oracleText:
Enchant creature card in a graveyard
When Animate Dead comes into play, if it's in play, it loses "enchant creature card in a graveyard" and gains "enchant creature put into play with Animate Dead." Return enchanted creature card to play under your control and attach Animate Dead to it. When Animate Dead leaves play, that creature's controller sacrifices it.
Enchanted creature gets -1/-0.
mc.printedText:
Enchant creature card in a graveyard
When Animate Dead comes into play, if it's in play, it loses "enchant creature card in a graveyard" and gains "enchant creature put into play with Animate Dead." Return enchanted creature card to play under your control and attach Animate Dead to it. When Animate Dead leaves play, that creature's controller sacrifices it.
Enchanted creature gets -1/-0.

mc.name: Animate Wall
mc.oracleText:
Enchant Wall
Enchanted Wall can attack as though it didn't have defender.
mc.printedText:
Enchant Wall
Enchanted Wall can attack as though it didn't have defender.

mc.name: Ankh of Mishra
mc.oracleText: Whenever a land comes into play, Ankh of Mishra deals 2 damage to that land's controller.
mc.printedText: Whenever a land comes into play, Ankh of Mishra deals 2 damage to that land's controller.

mc.name: Armageddon
mc.oracleText: Destroy all lands.
mc.printedText: Destroy all lands.

mc.name: Benalish Hero
mc.oracleText: Banding
mc.printedText: Banding
mc.flavorText: Benalia has a complex caste system that changes with the lunar year. No matter what the season, the only caste that cannot be attained by either heredity or money is that of the hero.

mc.name: Berserk
mc.oracleText:
Play Berserk only before the combat damage step.
Target creature gains trample and gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is its power. At end of turn, destroy that creature if it attacked this turn.
mc.printedText:
Play Berserk only before the combat damage step.
Target creature gains trample and gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is its power. At end of turn, destroy that creature if it attacked this turn.

mc.name: Clockwork Beast
mc.oracleText:
Clockwork Beast comes into play with seven +1/+0 counters on it.
At end of combat, if Clockwork Beast attacked or blocked this turn, remove a +1/+0 counter from it.
{X}, {T}: Put up to X +1/+0 counters on Clockwork Beast. This ability can't cause the total number of +1/+0 counters on Clockwork Beast to be greater than seven. Play this ability only during your upkeep.
mc.printedText:
Clockwork Beast comes into play with seven +1/+0 counters on it.
At end of combat, if Clockwork Beast attacked or blocked this turn, remove a +1/+0 counter from it.
{X}, {T}: Put up to X +1/+0 counters on Clockwork Beast. This ability can't cause the total number of +1/+0 counters on Clockwork Beast to be greater than seven. Play this ability only during your upkeep.

mc.name: Copper Tablet
mc.oracleText: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, Copper Tablet deals 1 damage to that player.
mc.printedText: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, Copper Tablet deals 1 damage to that player.

mc.name: Granite Gargoyle
mc.oracleText:
Flying
{R}: Granite Gargoyle gets +0/+1 until end of turn.
mc.printedText:
Flying
{R}: Granite Gargoyle gets +0/+1 until end of turn.
mc.flavorText:
"While most overworlders fortunately don't realize this, gargoyles can be most delicious, providing you have the appropriate tools to carve them."
--Asmoranomardicadaistinaculdacar,
The Underworld Cookbook

mc.name: Ice Storm
mc.oracleText: Destroy target land.
mc.printedText: Destroy target land.

mc.name: Keldon Warlord
mc.oracleText: Keldon Warlord's power and toughness are each equal to the number of non-Wall creatures you control.
mc.printedText: Keldon Warlord's power and toughness are each equal to the number of non-Wall creatures you control.

mc.name: Lightning Bolt
mc.oracleText: Lightning Bolt deals 3 damage to target creature or player.
mc.printedText: Lightning Bolt deals 3 damage to target creature or player.

mc.name: Mana Flare
mc.oracleText: Whenever a player taps a land for mana, that player adds one mana of that type to his or her mana pool.
mc.printedText: Whenever a player taps a land for mana, that player adds one mana of that type to his or her mana pool.

mc.name: Nether Shadow
mc.oracleText:
Haste
At the beginning of your upkeep, if Nether Shadow is in your graveyard with three or more creature cards above it, you may put Nether Shadow into play.
mc.printedText:
Haste
At the beginning of your upkeep, if Nether Shadow is in your graveyard with three or more creature cards above it, you may put Nether Shadow into play.

mc.name: Nevinyrral's Disk
mc.oracleText:
Nevinyrral's Disk comes into play tapped.
{1}, {T}: Destroy all artifacts, creatures, and enchantments.
mc.printedText:
Nevinyrral's Disk comes into play tapped.
{1}, {T}: Destroy all artifacts, creatures, and enchantments.

mc.name: Paralyze
mc.oracleText:
Enchant creature
When Paralyze comes into play, tap enchanted creature.
Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.
At the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted creature's controller, that player may pay {4}. If he or she does, untap the creature.
mc.printedText:
Enchant creature
When Paralyze comes into play, tap enchanted creature.
Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.
At the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted creature's controller, that player may pay {4}. If he or she does, untap the creature.

mc.name: Phantom Monster
mc.oracleText: Flying
mc.printedText: Flying
mc.flavorText:
"While, like a ghastly rapid river,
Through the pale door
A hideous throng rush out forever,
And laugh--but smile no more."
--Edgar Allan Poe, "The Haunted Palace"

mc.name: Psychic Venom
mc.oracleText:
Enchant land
Whenever enchanted land becomes tapped, Psychic Venom deals 2 damage to that land's controller.
mc.printedText:
Enchant land
Whenever enchanted land becomes tapped, Psychic Venom deals 2 damage to that land's controller.

mc.name: Scryb Sprites
mc.oracleText: Flying
mc.printedText: Flying
mc.flavorText: The only sound was the gentle clicking of the faeries' wings. Then those intruders who were still standing turned and fled. One thing was certain: they didn't think the Scryb were very funny anymore.

mc.name: Stone Giant
mc.oracleText: {T}: Target creature you control with toughness less than Stone Giant's power gains flying until end of turn. Destroy that creature at the beginning of the next end step.
mc.printedText: {T}: Target creature you control with toughness less than Stone Giant's power gains flying until end of turn. Destroy that creature at end of turn.
mc.flavorText: What goes up, must come down.

mc.name: Thicket Basilisk
mc.oracleText: Whenever Thicket Basilisk blocks or becomes blocked by a non-Wall creature, destroy that creature at end of combat.
mc.printedText: Whenever Thicket Basilisk blocks or becomes blocked by a non-Wall creature, destroy that creature at end of combat.
mc.flavorText: Moss-covered statues littered the area, a macabre monument to the basilisk's power.

mc.name: Winter Orb
mc.oracleText: As long as Winter Orb is untapped, players can't untap more than one land during their untap steps.
mc.printedText: As long as Winter Orb is untapped, players can't untap more than one land during their untap steps.

mc.name: Adun Oakenshield
mc.oracleText: {B}{R}{G}, {T}: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
mc.printedText: {B}{R}{G}, {T}: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
mc.flavorText:
". . . And at his passing, the bodies of the world's great warriors shall rise from their graves and follow him to battle."
--The Anvilonian Grimoire

mc.name: Dakkon Blackblade
mc.oracleText: Dakkon Blackblade's power and toughness are each equal to the number of lands you control.
mc.printedText: Dakkon Blackblade's power and toughness are each equal to the number of lands you control.
mc.flavorText:
"My power is as vast as the plains, my strength is that of mountains. Each wave that crashes upon the shore thunders like blood in my veins."
--Dakkon Blackblade, Memoirs

mc.name: Divine Transformation
mc.oracleText:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +3/+3.
mc.printedText:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +3/+3.
mc.flavorText: Glory surged through her and radiance surrounded her. All things were possible with the blessing of the Divine.

mc.name: Eureka
mc.oracleText: Starting with you, each player may put a permanent card from his or her hand into play. Repeat this process until no one puts a card into play.
mc.printedText: Starting with you, each player may put a permanent card from his or her hand into play. Repeat this process until no one puts a card into play.

mc.name: Jacques le Vert
mc.oracleText: Green creatures you control get +0/+2.
mc.printedText: Green creatures you control get +0/+2.
mc.flavorText: Abandoning his sword to return to the lush forest of Pendelhaven, Jacques le Vert devoted his life to protecting the creatures of his homeland.

mc.name: Mirror Universe
mc.oracleText: {T}, Sacrifice Mirror Universe: Exchange life totals with target opponent. Play this ability only during your upkeep.
mc.printedText: {T}, Sacrifice Mirror Universe: Exchange life totals with target opponent. Play this ability only during your upkeep.

mc.name: Moat
mc.oracleText: Creatures without flying can't attack.
mc.printedText: Creatures without flying can't attack.
mc.flavorText: The purpose of any moat is to impede attack. Some are filled with water, some with thistles. Some are filled with things best left unseen.

mc.name: Petra Sphinx
mc.oracleText: {T}: Target player names a card, then reveals the top card of his or her library. If that card is the named card, that player puts it into his or her hand. If it isn't, the player puts it into his or her graveyard.
mc.printedText: {T}: Target player names a card, then reveals the top card of his or her library. If that card is the named card, that player puts it into his or her hand. If it isn't, the player puts it into his or her graveyard.
mc.flavorText: What walks on four legs in the morning, two legs in the afternoon, and three legs in the evening?

mc.name: Psychic Purge
mc.oracleText:
Psychic Purge deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
When a spell or ability an opponent controls causes you to discard Psychic Purge, that player loses 5 life.
mc.printedText:
Psychic Purge deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
When a spell or ability an opponent controls causes you to discard Psychic Purge, that player loses 5 life.

mc.name: Rabid Wombat
mc.oracleText:
Vigilance
Rabid Wombat gets +2/+2 for each Aura attached to it.
mc.printedText:
Vigilance
Rabid Wombat gets +2/+2 for each Aura attached to it.

mc.name: Righteous Avengers
mc.oracleText: Plainswalk
mc.printedText: Plainswalk
mc.flavorText: Few can withstand the wrath of the righteous.

mc.name: Spinal Villain
mc.oracleText: {T}: Destroy target blue creature.
mc.printedText: {T}: Destroy target blue creature.
mc.flavorText:
"Striking silent as a dream,
Cutting short the strangled scream . . ."
--Tobrian, "Watchdragon"

mc.name: Storm Seeker
mc.oracleText: Storm Seeker deals damage equal to the number of cards in target player's hand to that player.
mc.printedText: Storm Seeker deals damage equal to the number of cards in target player's hand to that player.

mc.name: Sylvan Library
mc.oracleText: At the beginning of your draw step, you may draw two cards. If you do, choose two cards in your hand drawn this turn. For each of those cards, pay 4 life or put the card on top of your library.
mc.printedText: At the beginning of your draw step, you may draw two cards. If you do, choose two cards in your hand drawn this turn. For each of those cards, pay 4 life or put the card on top of your library.

mc.name: Thunder Spirit
mc.oracleText: Flying, first strike
mc.printedText: Flying, first strike

mc.name: Winds of Change
mc.oracleText: Each player shuffles the cards from his or her hand into his or her library, then draws that many cards.
mc.printedText: Each player shuffles the cards from his or her hand into his or her library, then draws that many cards.
mc.flavorText:
"'Tis the set of sails and not the gales
Which tells us the way to go."
--Ella Wheeler Wilcox, "Winds of Fate"

mc.name: Angry Mob
mc.oracleText:
Trample
As long as it's your turn, Angry Mob's power and toughness are each equal to 2 plus the number of Swamps your opponents control. As long as it's not your turn, Angry Mob's power and toughness are each 2.
mc.printedText:
Trample
As long as it's your turn, Angry Mob's power and toughness are each equal to 2 plus the number of Swamps your opponents control. As long as it's not your turn, Angry Mob's power and toughness are each 2.

mc.name: Basal Thrull
mc.oracleText: {T}, Sacrifice Basal Thrull: Add {B}{B} to your mana pool.
mc.printedText: {T}, Sacrifice Basal Thrull: Add {B}{B} to your mana pool.
mc.flavorText:
Initially bred for sacrifice, the thrulls eventually turned on their masters, the Order of the Ebon Hand, with gruesome results.
--Sarpadian Empires, vol. II

mc.name: Dwarven Catapult
mc.oracleText: Dwarven Catapult deals X damage divided evenly, rounded down, among all creatures target opponent controls.
mc.printedText: Dwarven Catapult deals X damage divided evenly, rounded down, among all creatures target opponent controls.
mc.flavorText:
"Often greatly outnumbered in battle, dwarves relied on catapults as one means of damaging a large army."
--Sarpadian Empires, vol. IV

mc.name: Goblin Chirurgeon
mc.oracleText: Sacrifice a Goblin: Regenerate target creature.
mc.printedText: Sacrifice a Goblin: Regenerate target creature.
mc.flavorText:
"Perhaps goblins are good for something after all."
--General Khurzog

mc.name: Goblin Grenade
mc.oracleText:
As an additional cost to play Goblin Grenade, sacrifice a Goblin.
Goblin Grenade deals 5 damage to target creature or player.
mc.printedText:
As an additional cost to play Goblin Grenade, sacrifice a Goblin.
Goblin Grenade deals 5 damage to target creature or player.
mc.flavorText:
"According to accepted theory, the grenade held some kind of flammable mixture and was carried to its target by a hapless goblin."
--Sarpadian Empires, vol. IV

mc.name: Rainbow Vale
mc.oracleText: {T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool. An opponent gains control of Rainbow Vale at end of turn.
mc.printedText: {T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool. An opponent gains control of Rainbow Vale at end of turn.
mc.flavorText: In the feudal days of Icatia, finding the Rainbow Vale was often the goal of knights' quests.

mc.name: Bestial Fury
mc.oracleText:
Enchant creature
When Bestial Fury comes into play, draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.
Whenever enchanted creature becomes blocked, it gets +4/+0 and gains trample until end of turn.
mc.printedText:
Enchant creature
When Bestial Fury comes into play, draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.
Whenever enchanted creature becomes blocked, it gets +4/+0 and gains trample until end of turn.

mc.name: Feast or Famine
mc.oracleText: Choose one - Put a 2/2 black Zombie creature token into play; or destroy target nonblack, nonartifact creature and it can't be regenerated.
mc.printedText: Choose one Put a 2/2 black Zombie creature token into play; or destroy target nonblack, nonartifact creature and it can't be regenerated.
mc.flavorText:
"We are not yet free of Lim-Dul's terrors."
--Halvor Arensson, Kjeldoran priest

mc.name: Phyrexian Boon
mc.oracleText:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+1 as long as it's black. Otherwise, it gets -1/-2.
mc.printedText:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+1 as long as it's black. Otherwise, it gets -1/-2.
mc.flavorText:
"Phyrexia's touch is painful to all but the blackest of hearts."
--Gerda Aagesdotter,
Archmage of the Unseen

mc.name: Varchild's War-Riders
mc.oracleText:
Cumulative upkeep-Put a 1/1 red Survivor creature token into play under an opponent's control.
Trample, rampage 1 (Whenever this creature becomes blocked, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each creature blocking it beyond the first.)
mc.printedText:
Cumulative upkeep--Put a 1/1 red Survivor creature token into play under an opponent's control.
Trample, rampage 1 (Whenever this creature becomes blocked, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each creature blocking it beyond the first.)
mc.flavorText:
"What tries to crush our spirit only strengthens our resolve."
--Lovisa Coldeyes, Balduvian chieftain

mc.name: Argivian Archaeologist
mc.oracleText: {W}{W}, {T}: Return target artifact card from your graveyard to your hand.
mc.printedText: {W}{W}, {T}: Return target artifact card from your graveyard to your hand.
mc.flavorText: Fascinated by the lore of ancient struggles, the archaeologist searches incessantly for remnants of an earlier, more powerful era.

mc.name: Artifact Blast
mc.oracleText: Counter target artifact spell.
mc.printedText: Counter target artifact spell.
mc.flavorText: The first line of defense against Urza and Mishra, the artifact blast achieved widespread fame until an unlucky mage discovered it was useless on the devices the brothers had already created.

mc.name: Hecatomb
mc.oracleText:
When Hecatomb comes into play, sacrifice Hecatomb unless you sacrifice four creatures.
Tap an untapped Swamp you control: Hecatomb deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
mc.printedText:
When Hecatomb comes into play, sacrifice Hecatomb unless you sacrifice four creatures.
Tap an untapped Swamp you control: Hecatomb deals 1 damage to target creature or player.

mc.name: Illusions of Grandeur
mc.oracleText:
Cumulative upkeep {2}
When Illusions of Grandeur comes into play, you gain 20 life.
When Illusions of Grandeur leaves play, you lose 20 life.
mc.printedText:
Cumulative upkeep {2}
When Illusions of Grandeur comes into play, you gain 20 life.
When Illusions of Grandeur leaves play, you lose 20 life.

mc.name: Word of Undoing
mc.oracleText: Return target creature and all white Auras you own attached to it to their owners' hands.
mc.printedText: Return target creature and all white Auras you own attached to it to their owners' hands.
mc.flavorText:
"It was in Urza's journals that I finally found the secret at the core of the summonings."
--Journal, author unknown

mc.name: Zuran Orb
mc.oracleText: Sacrifice a land: You gain 2 life.
mc.printedText: Sacrifice a land: You gain 2 life.
mc.flavorText:
"I will go to any length to achieve my goal. Eternal life is worth any sacrifice."
--Zur the Enchanter

mc.name: Death Ward
mc.oracleText: Regenerate target creature.
mc.printedText: Regenerate target creature.

mc.name: Forcefield
mc.oracleText: {1}: The next time target unblocked creature would deal combat damage to you this turn, prevent all but 1 of that damage.
mc.printedText: {1}: The next time target unblocked creature would deal combat damage to you this turn, prevent all but 1 of that damage.

mc.name: Wanderlust
mc.oracleText:
Enchant creature
At the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted creature's controller, Wanderlust deals 1 damage to that player.
mc.printedText:
Enchant creature
At the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted creature's controller, Wanderlust deals 1 damage to that player.

mc.name: Goblin Wizard
mc.oracleText:
{T}: You may put a Goblin permanent card from your hand into play.
{R}: Target Goblin gains protection from white until end of turn.
mc.printedText:
{T}: You may put a Goblin permanent card from your hand into play.
{R}: Target Goblin gains protection from white until end of turn.

mc.name: Goblins of the Flarg
mc.oracleText:
Mountainwalk
When you control a Dwarf, sacrifice Goblins of the Flarg.
mc.printedText:
Mountainwalk
When you control a Dwarf, sacrifice Goblins of the Flarg.

mc.name: Island of Wak-Wak
mc.oracleText: {T}: The power of target creature with flying becomes 0 until end of turn.
mc.printedText: {T}: The power of target creature with flying becomes 0 until end of turn.
mc.flavorText: The Isle of Wak-Wak, home to a tribe of winged folk, is named for a peculiar fruit that grows there. The fruit looks like a woman's head, and when ripe speaks the word "Wak."

mc.name: Khabál Ghoul
mc.oracleText: At end of turn, put a +1/+1 counter on Khabál Ghoul for each creature put into a graveyard from play this turn.
mc.printedText: At end of turn, put a +1/+1 counter on Khabal Ghoul for each creature put into a graveyard from play this turn.

mc.name: Singing Tree
mc.oracleText: {T}: Target attacking creature's power becomes 0 until end of turn.
mc.printedText: {T}: Target attacking creature's power becomes 0 until end of turn.

mc.name: Wyluli Wolf
mc.oracleText: {T}: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
mc.printedText: {T}: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
mc.flavorText:
"When one wolf calls, others follow. Who wants to fight creatures that eat scorpions?"
--Maimun al-Wyluli, diary

mc.name: Blight
mc.oracleText:
Enchant land
When enchanted land becomes tapped, destroy it.
mc.printedText:
Enchant land
When enchanted land becomes tapped, destroy it.

mc.name: Crookshank Kobolds
mc.oracleText: Crookshank Kobolds is red.
mc.printedText: Crookshank Kobolds is red.
mc.flavorText: The Crookshank military boasts a standing army of nearly twenty-four million, give or take twenty-two million.

mc.name: Juxtapose
mc.oracleText: You and target player exchange control of the creature you each control with the highest converted mana cost. Then exchange control of artifacts the same way. If two or more permanents a player controls are tied for highest cost, their controller chooses one of them.
mc.printedText: You and target player exchange control of the creature you each control with the highest converted mana cost. Then exchange control of artifacts the same way. If two or more permanents a player controls are tied for highest cost, their controller chooses one of them.

mc.name: Mountain Yeti
mc.oracleText: Mountainwalk, protection from white
mc.printedText: Mountainwalk, protection from white
mc.flavorText: The Yeti's single greatest asset is its unnerving ability to blend in with its surroundings.

mc.name: Telekinesis
mc.oracleText: Tap target creature. Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt by that creature this turn. It doesn't untap during its controller's next two untap steps.
mc.printedText: Tap target creature. Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt by that creature this turn. It doesn't untap during its controller's next two untap steps.

mc.name: Time Elemental
mc.oracleText:
When Time Elemental attacks or blocks, at end of combat, sacrifice it and it deals 5 damage to you.
{2}{U}{U}, {T}: Return target permanent that isn't enchanted to its owner's hand.
mc.printedText:
When Time Elemental attacks or blocks, at end of combat, sacrifice it and it deals 5 damage to you.
{2}{U}{U}, {T}: Return target permanent that isn't enchanted to its owner's hand.

mc.name: Death Speakers
mc.oracleText: Protection from black
mc.printedText: Protection from black
mc.flavorText:
"Such innocent little birds. They sing a sweet song, sitting on their fragile branch."
--Grandmother Sengir

mc.name: Black Knight
mc.oracleText:
First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)
Protection from white (This creature can't be blocked, targeted, dealt damage, or enchanted by anything white.)
mc.printedText: First strike, protection from white
mc.flavorText: Battle doesn't need a purpose; the battle is its own purpose. You don't ask why a plague spreads or a field burns. Don't ask why I fight.

mc.name: Crusade
mc.oracleText: White creatures get +1/+1.
mc.printedText: White creatures get +1/+1.

mc.name: Mesa Pegasus
mc.oracleText: Flying, banding
mc.printedText: Flying, banding
mc.flavorText: Before a woman marries in the village of Sursi, she must visit the land of the mesa pegasus. Legend has it that if the woman is pure of heart and her love is true, a mesa pegasus will appear, blessing her family with long life and good fortune.

mc.name: Vesuvan Doppelganger
mc.oracleText: As Vesuvan Doppelganger comes into play, you may choose a creature in play. If you do, Vesuvan Doppelganger comes into play as a copy of that creature except for its color and gains "At the beginning of your upkeep, you may have this creature become a copy of target creature except for its color. If you do, this creature gains this ability."
mc.printedText: As Vesuvan Doppelganger comes into play, you may choose a creature in play. If you do, Vesuvan Doppelganger comes into play as a copy of that creature except for its color and gains "At the beginning of your upkeep, you may have this creature become a copy of target creature except for its color. If you do, this creature gains this ability."

mc.name: Mindstab Thrull
mc.oracleText: Whenever Mindstab Thrull attacks and isn't blocked, you may sacrifice it. If you do, defending player discards three cards.
mc.printedText: Whenever Mindstab Thrull attacks and isn't blocked, you may sacrifice it. If you do, defending player discards three cards.

mc.name: River Merfolk
mc.oracleText: {U}: River Merfolk gains mountainwalk until end of turn.
mc.printedText: {U}: River Merfolk gains mountainwalk until end of turn.
mc.flavorText:
"Dwelling in icy mountain streams near goblin and orcish foes, the river merfolk were known for their stoicism."
--Sarpadian Empires, vol. V

mc.name: Chains of Mephistopheles
mc.oracleText: If a player would draw a card except the first one he or she draws in his or her draw step each turn, that player discards a card instead. If the player discards a card this way, he or she draws a card. If the player doesn't discard a card this way, he or she puts the top card of his or her library into his or her graveyard.
mc.printedText: If a player would draw a card except the first one he or she draws in his or her draw step each turn, that player discards a card instead. If the player discards a card this way, he or she draws a card. If the player doesn't discard a card this way, he or she puts the top card of his or her library into his or her graveyard.

mc.name: Elder Land Wurm
mc.oracleText:
Defender, trample
When Elder Land Wurm blocks, it loses defender.
mc.printedText:
Defender, trample
When Elder Land Wurm blocks, it loses defender.
mc.flavorText: Sometimes it's best to let sleeping dragons lie.

mc.name: Greater Realm of Preservation
mc.oracleText: {1}{W}: The next time a black or red source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.
mc.printedText: {1}{W}: The next time a black or red source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.

mc.name: Serpent Generator
mc.oracleText: {4}, {T}: Put a 1/1 Snake artifact creature token into play. This creature has "Whenever this creature deals damage to a player, that player gets a poison counter." (A player with ten or more poison counters loses the game.)
mc.printedText: {4}, {T}: Put a 1/1 Snake artifact creature token into play. This creature has "Whenever this creature deals damage to a player, that player gets a poison counter." (A player with ten or more poison counters loses the game.)

mc.name: Winter Blast
mc.oracleText: Tap X target creatures. Winter Blast deals 2 damage to each of those creatures with flying.
mc.printedText: Tap X target creatures. Winter Blast deals 2 damage to each of those creatures with flying.
mc.flavorText: "Blow, winds, and crack your cheeks! rage! blow!"William Shakespeare, King Lear

mc.name: Amnesia
mc.oracleText: Target player reveals his or her hand and discards all nonland cards.
mc.printedText: Target player reveals his or her hand and discards all nonland cards.
mc.flavorText:
"When one has witnessed the unspeakable, 'tis sometimes better to forget."
--Vervamon the Elder

mc.name: Tivadar's Crusade
mc.oracleText: Destroy all Goblins.
mc.printedText: Destroy all Goblins.

mc.name: Energy Arc
mc.oracleText: Untap any number of target creatures. Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to and dealt by those creatures this turn.
mc.printedText: Untap any number of target creatures. Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to and dealt by those creatures this turn.
mc.flavorText:
"Relent, and you may transcend your situation."
--Gerda Aagesdotter,
Archmage of the Unseen

mc.name: Mystic Remora
mc.oracleText:
Cumulative upkeep {1}
Whenever an opponent plays a noncreature spell, you may draw a card unless that player pays {4}.
mc.printedText:
Cumulative upkeep {1}
Whenever an opponent plays a noncreature spell, you may draw a card unless that player pays {4}.

mc.name: Lim-Dûl's Vault
mc.oracleText: Look at the top five cards of your library. As many times as you choose, you may pay 1 life, put those cards on the bottom of your library, then look at the top five cards of your library. Then shuffle your library and put the last cards you looked at this way on top of it in any order.
mc.printedText: Look at the top five cards of your library. As many times as you choose, you may pay 1 life, put those cards on the bottom of your library, then look at the top five cards of your library. Then shuffle your library and put the last cards you looked at this way on top of it in any order.

mc.name: Tornado
mc.oracleText:
Cumulative upkeep {G}
{2}{G}, Pay 3 life for each velocity counter on Tornado: Destroy target permanent and put a velocity counter on Tornado. Play this ability only once each turn.
mc.printedText:
Cumulative upkeep {G}
{2}{G}, Pay 3 life for each velocity counter on Tornado: Destroy target permanent and put a velocity counter on Tornado. Play this ability only once each turn.

mc.name: Centaur Archer
mc.oracleText: {T}: Centaur Archer deals 1 damage to target creature with flying.
mc.printedText: {T}: Centaur Archer deals 1 damage to target creature with flying.
mc.flavorText:
"Centaurs will kill our aesthir if they can; they've always been enemies. Destroy the horse-people on sight."
--Arna Kennerud, Skyknight

mc.name: Fire Covenant
mc.oracleText:
As an additional cost to play Fire Covenant, pay X life.
Fire Covenant deals X damage divided as you choose among any number of target creatures.
mc.printedText:
As an additional cost to play Fire Covenant, pay X life.
Fire Covenant deals X damage divided as you choose among any number of target creatures.

mc.name: Hyalopterous Lemure
mc.oracleText: {0}: Hyalopterous Lemure gets -1/-0 and gains flying until end of turn.
mc.printedText: {0}: Hyalopterous Lemure gets -1/-0 and gains flying until end of turn.
mc.flavorText:
"The lemures looked harmless, until they descended on my troops. Within moments, only bones remained."
--Lucilde Fiksdotter, Leader of the Order of the White Shield

mc.name: Hymn of Rebirth
mc.oracleText: Put target creature card in a graveyard into play under your control.
mc.printedText: Put target creature card in a graveyard into play under your control.
mc.flavorText:
"There will come soft rains, and spring shall be amongst us, a welcome friend."
--Halvor Arenson, Kjeldoran priest

mc.name: Shield of the Ages
mc.oracleText: {2}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to you this turn.
mc.printedText: {2}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to you this turn.
mc.flavorText:
"This shield is a true rarity: an artifact whose purpose is obvious."
--Arcum Dagsson, Soldevi machinist

mc.name: Cursed Rack
mc.oracleText:
As Cursed Rack comes into play, choose an opponent.
The chosen player's maximum hand size is four.
mc.printedText:
As Cursed Rack comes into play, choose an opponent.
The chosen player's maximum hand size is four.
mc.flavorText: Ashnod invented several torture techniques that could make victims even miles away beg for mercy as if the End had come.

mc.name: Dragon Engine
mc.oracleText: {2}: Dragon Engine gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
mc.printedText: {2}: Dragon Engine gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
mc.flavorText: Those who believed the city of Kroog would never fall to Mishra's forces severely underestimated the might of his war machines.

mc.name: Urza's Chalice
mc.oracleText: Whenever a player plays an artifact spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, you gain 1 life.
mc.printedText: Whenever a player plays an artifact spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, you gain 1 life.
mc.flavorText: When sorely wounded or tired, Urza would often retreat to the workshops of his apprentices. They were greatly amazed at how much better he looked each time he took a sip of water.

mc.name: Icatian Town
mc.oracleText: Put four 1/1 white Citizen creature tokens into play.
mc.printedText: Put four 1/1 white Citizen creature tokens into play.
mc.flavorText: Icatia's once peaceful towns faced increasing attacks from orcs and goblins as the climate cooled. By the time the empire fell, they were little more than armed camps.

mc.name: Ydwen Efreet
mc.oracleText: Whenever you're attacked, flip a coin. If you lose the flip, Ydwen Efreet can't block this turn.
mc.printedText: Whenever you're attacked, flip a coin. If you lose the flip, Ydwen Efreet can't block this turn.

mc.name: Seasinger
mc.oracleText:
When you control no Islands, sacrifice Seasinger.
You may choose not to untap Seasinger during your untap step.
{T}: Gain control of target creature whose controller controls an Island as long as you control Seasinger and as long as Seasinger remains tapped.
mc.printedText:
When you control no Islands, sacrifice Seasinger.
You may choose not to untap Seasinger during your untap step.
{T}: Gain control of target creature whose controller controls an Island as long as you control Seasinger and as long as Seasinger remains tapped.

mc.name: Icatian Lieutenant
mc.oracleText: {1}{W}: Target Soldier creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
mc.printedText: {1}{W}: Target Soldier creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
mc.flavorText: To become an officer, an Icatian soldier had to pass a series of tests. These evaluated not only fighting and leadership skills, but also integrity, honor, and moral strength.
